animeDescription: Episode 1: Fuyujima ni Furu Sakura  Diligent animators took Banpresto's "One Piece Cry heart ~Fuyujima ni Furu Sakura~" (One Piece Cry heart ~The Cherry Blossoms That Fall on Winter Island~) line of crane game prize figures and created a five-minute stop-motion short. The short recreates the famous "Hiluluk's Cherry Blossoms" scene from Eiichiro Oda's manga and anime One Piece.   Episode 2: Fuyujima ni Furu Sakura  A stop-motion animated video for Banpresto's "One Piece Cry heart ~children's dream~" line of crane game prize figures. The short recreates the famous "Oath of Brothers" scene from Eiichiro Oda's manga and anime.  Episode 3: Ace no Saigo  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['One Piece', 'One Piece Movie 9: Episode of Chopper Plus - Fuyu ni Saku, Kiseki no Sakura']
